sentence.text: Specifically, glutamate catabolic process via 2-oxoglutarate, positive regulation of cardiac muscle hypertrophy, and adenylate cyclase-modulating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway were hypermethylated and downregulated in colon cancer, suggesting that the low expression levels of these genes may be regulated by DNA hypermethylation.

entity.text: positive regulation of cardiac muscle hypertrophy
adenylate cyclase-modulating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
